content:
so I'm trying to get the emacs support working but I must be missing some steps =) I guess I have to install lsp-mode and ht?

I did that, but it still doesn't seem to "enable" when I open rust code... maybe i'm missing some hooks?
seems to be working for me -- question, what is ra.el?
nothing, just removed the file :) It contained my experiments for emacs intgration, but, since I rarely use emacs for coding, it bitrotted.
